name: [INDEV] Springtime at Shoreline (Too Early Demo Available!)
name_original: [INDEV] Springtime at Shoreline (Too Early Demo Available!)
description:
Differences Between Versions:

  • Too Early Demo - An unfinished Act One that has the story stop abruptly, UI/backgrounds that still need editing, and no music or sound FX.  But hey, early looks at unfinished games are cool.  Released 3/3/2023.  Free and exclusive to itch.io.
  • Act One Demo - The first of the game's five acts, available as a demo!  Released when it's released.  Free and available on both itch.io.
  • Full Game - The full five acts of friendship, relaxation, and beach life!  Released when its released.  $6 and available on itch.io

~

I'm postponing development on this one until I'm done with Clash: Blue Mirage (or until I need a break from Clash: Blue Mirage).

~

This game contains themes of mental health and abuse.  It also contains themes of hope and healing.

You - a 32 year old businesswoman- arrive at Shoreline early one April morning.  You have just moved here to recover after a severe mental breakdown.  You are used to the hustle and bustle of your busy life, so the sudden slow small-town aura of Shoreline is something you will have to get used to.  

The citizens of Shoreline are happy to show you around, help you find a low-stress job, give you a tour of the bay, buy you a drink or some dinner, and try to find you a best friend.  They're a lovely bunch who make you feel right at home.

Did I mention everyone is a fish person? 

  • Live a calm month by the sea
  • Be an aquan (fish person) hanging out with other aquans - all inspired by real-life fish!
  • Engage in nautical activities like dolphin watching, shell collecting, and fishing
  • Bond with the strange citizens of Shoreline and make a new best friend
  • Let the saltwater air heal you
